entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add-Migration fails with "An item with the same key has already been added" when renaming entity #27504
  • Switch to RETURNING/OUTPUT as the default way to retrieve generated values #27503
  • ArgumentOutOfRange exception with custom IMigrationsIdGenerator #27502
  • Azure DevOps build fails after updating to .NET/EF Core 6, ModelShapShot with long (64bit int) id fails #27501

Closed

  • Add EFCore support (or documentation) for enabling AlwaysEncrypted w/ SQL Server #27499

PullRequests

Updated

  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.23.0 to 3.25.0 #27487
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #27395
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
    blocked
